verse.name: v1
verse.lines: What to say Lord, newline It's you who gave me life and I newline Can't explain just how newline Much you mean to me now that newline You have saved me Lord newline I give all that I am to You newline that everyday I can newline Be a light that shines your name

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Everday Lord I'll newline learn to stand upon your word newline And I pray that I newline That I might come to know you More newline That you would guide me newline In every single step I take newline that everday I can newline Be your light unto the world

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Everyday newline It's you I'll live for newline Everyday newline I'll follow after you newline Everyday newline I'll walk with you my Lord

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: It's you I live for everyday newline It's you I live for everyday newline It's you I live for everday
